key.name: auto-download
key.summary: Whether or not Vocal should automatically download new episodes
key.description: Whether or not Vocal should automatically download new episodes when they are available.

key.name: autoclean-library
key.summary: Whether or not Vocal should automatically delete old downloaded episdes
key.description: Whether or not Vocal should automatically delete downloaded, played episodes that are more than a week old.

key.name: window-width
key.summary: The user's last window width
key.description: The user's last window width

key.name: sidebar-width
key.summary: The user's preferred sidebar width
key.description: The preferred width of the sidebar that displays episode descriptions.

key.name: window-height
key.summary: The user's last window height
key.description: The user's last window height

key.name: update-interval
key.summary: The number of minutes between checking for episodes
key.description: The number of minutes to wait between checking for new episodes

key.name: fast-forward-seconds
key.summary: The number of seconds to fast forward
key.description: The number of seconds to fast forward

key.name: rewind-seconds
key.summary: The number of seconds to rewind
key.description: The number of seconds to rewind

key.name: library-location
key.summary: The directory where podcasts are stored
key.description: The directory where podcasts are stored

key.name: last-played-media
key.summary: The podcast and episode that was last playing
key.description: The podcast and episode that was last played, in podcast_name,episode_title format

key.name: continue-running-after-close
key.summary: Whether or not Vocal should run in the background after closing
key.description: Whether or not Vocal should keep running in the background for feed updates and downloads.

key.name: itunes-store-country
key.summary: The iTunes country code to search for results
key.description: When finding the top n podcasts, Vocal will search for results from a particular country's iTunes Store.

key.name: show-name-label
key.summary: Whether or not Vocal should display the names of podcasts in the local library
key.description: When enabled, Vocal will show an extra label beneath the cover art in the library with the name of the podcast.

key.name: dark-mode-enabled
key.summary: Whether or not Vocal should use the dark theme instead of the light theme.
key.description: When enabled, Vocal will use the dark version of the GTK theme and modify the headerbar color if on elementary OS.

key.name: archive-access-key
key.summary: Your archive.org accounts S3 access key
key.description: The S3 access key from an archive.org account (https://archive.org/account/s3.php)

key.name: archive-secret-key
key.summary: Your archive.org accounts S3 secret key
key.description: The S3 secret key from an archive.org account (https://archive.org/account/s3.php)

key.name: newest-episodes-first
key.summary: Whether to show the newest episodes highest up in the list, or at the bottom
key.description: When set to true, Vocal will show the newest episodes at the top of episode lists. When false, the oldest will be at the top.

key.name: keep-playing-in-background
key.summary: Whether or not to keep Vocal playing in the background
key.description: When set to true, Vocal will keep running and playing in the background when the close button is pressed. When set to false, Vocal will exit the program when close is pressed.

key.name: gpodder-device-name
key.summary: The name of the device for gpodder.net
key.description: The name of the device that gets displayed on gpodder.net. Typically, it is set to some combination of "vocal" and the hardware device name. That said, you can get as creative as you want.

key.name: gpodder-username
key.summary: The username of the last successfully logged-in gpodder.net user
key.description: Contains the username of the last gpodder.net user account to successfully login to the service.

key.name: gpodder-sync-episode-status
key.summary: Whether or not to keep episode status in sync with the cloud
key.description: When set to true, Vocal will automatically sync all the episode statuses with gpodder.net, including whether or not an episode has been listened to, as well as playback progress.

key.name: gpodder-remove-deleted-podcasts
key.summary: Whether or not to remove podcasts that are no longer in the gpodder.net subscriptions
key.description: When set to true, Vocal will automatically remove a podcast from the library when it is no longer in the user's gpodder.net subscription list (typically following a delete event from another device).

key.name: gpodder-last-successful-sync-timestamp
key.summary: The UNIX timestamp of the last successful episode sync
key.description: The UNIX timestamp of the last time Vocal successfully contacted the gpodder.net service and received an update of episode actions.
